description: Add Only. If true, will not allow update of an already existing Tax Applicability object.

Tax_ApplicabilityObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Tax_ApplicabilityObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Tax_ApplicabilityObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Tax_Applicability_Data.description: This is the unique identifier for Tax Applicability
Tax Applicability Code. Description of the applicability, such as "Non-Taxable Sales"

validation.validation: Enter a unique Tax Applicability Code. [code] is already in use.
validation.description: The Tax Applicability Code entered has already been used.

validation.validation: Taxable field cannot be changed since the Tax Applicability is in use.

Tax_RecoverabilityObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Tax_RecoverabilityObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Tax_RecoverabilityObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: For a Tax Applicability that is non-taxable, you can only specify the Tax Recoverability that is Non Recoverable.
validation.description: For a Tax Applicability that is non-taxable, you can only specify the Tax Recoverability that is Non Recoverable.
